text: Tabuaeran is one of the Line Islands of the central Pacific Ocean. It is an atoll. Tabueran is part of Kiribati. The highest point on the island is about 3 m (10 ft) above high tide. Tabuaeran is the name in Gilbertese language. The island is also called Fanning Island or Fanning Atoll in English. ==Other websites== *Map of Tabuaeran *Fanning Island on Jane Resture's Oceania Home Page A strong resource including geography, history, photos, and links. *Fanning-Island.com *Ancient Polynesian remains *Atoll Institute, proposed Field Station * Edmund Fanning in Explorers of the Pacific by Buck (eText) Category:Pacific islands Category:Atolls Category:Islands of Kiribati
title: Tabuaeran
